DOC.detailed_description: This study examine effectiveness Cognitive Behavioral Analysis System Psychotherapy ( CBASP ) reduce alcohol consumption depressive symptom adult chronically depress alcohol dependent . Participants receive 20-session course CBASP psychotherapy period 21 week assess severity pretreatment psychological abuse trauma well pre posttreatment interpersonal functioning . Two primary hypothesis test : 1 ) demonstrate CBASP effective reduce depressive symptom ( Hamilton Rating Scale Depression-24 rating ) alcohol consumption ( drink per drinking day ) chronically depressed alcohol dependent cohort posttreatment rating compare pretreatment level ; 2 ) demonstrate acquisition feel safe therapist acquisition ability perceive interpersonal consequence one 's behavior significantly increase pre posttreatment level associate reduction drink depressive symptom .
